resources.string: Hello. Welcome to Rocket and Pumkins
Please set the launch angle by scrolling your thumb up and down.
Please set the launch velocity by scrolling your thumb up and down.
Double tap the screen to finalize the value. To reset SHAKE your phone
Double tap the screen to launch the rocket
You missed. Decrease the angle for better result
You missed. Increase the angle for better result
You missed. Increase the velocity for better result
You missed. Decrease the velocity for better result
Deudde, You did it. Bulls eye. Pumkins are angry.
